price: 7. Y a Al-lah pertenecen los ejércitos de los cielos y de la tierra; y Al-lah es Poderoso y Sabio.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walillahi junūdu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
